messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: A freelancer is a person who works for themselves. I am a freelancer.

This is great. I can decide what I do. I can also decide how I use my time. First, I worked at home. But it was very hard to focus. Many things stopped me from working. I had to clean the house. I wanted to drink more tea. And my family wanted to talk to me.

So I went to a café near my home. But the Wi-Fi was not good. And I drank too much coffee.

In the end, I rented a desk in a special office. It is a co-working space. Five other freelancers work there too. I like it. I get dressed in the morning to go to work. I can focus in a place like an office.
